TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CommunicationObjectFaultedException extends System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to a communication object that has faulted.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is thrown when a call is made to a faulted communication object. <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException> is a derived class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException?displayProperty=fullName> and can occur in correct applications. Because typically the code that calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method reports the error condition that caused the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this exception indicates that the call failed but the most useful error information is elsewhere.
> [!NOTE] > If an object is faulted with several pending calls, only one call throws a specific exception; the others throw <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationObjectFaultedException>.
